title: Confirm media playback
custom_preconds: Test for each of the following postseason providers: MLBN, FOX, FS1, and TBS
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user signed in with correct entitlements (MLBALL for MLBN, channel-specific MVPD auth for FOX, FS1, and TBS)
WHEN a user taps on a live game carried by that provider
THEN the game is displayed successfully

GIVEN a free user
WHEN that user taps on a postseason live or archived game
THEN that user is presented with a paywall

title: ESPN playback
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is logged in with any non-executive account
WHEN that user taps on a live game from ESPN
THEN that user is presented with a blackout message

GIVEN a user is logged in with an executive account
WHEN that user taps on a live game from ESPN
THEN that user is able to watch the stream successfully

GIVEN a user is logged in with a Canadian or other international user
WHEN that user taps on a live game from ESPN
THEN that user is able to watch the stream successfully

title: Team page and Scoreboard Playback
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user logged in with the correct MVPD entitlements
WHEN a user taps on an MLB.TV link to a live game on the team page
THEN the game is displayed successfully

GIVEN a user logged in with the correct MVPD entitlements
WHEN a user taps on an MLB.TV link to a live game on the scoreboard
THEN the game is displayed successfully

title: Audio Playback
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user with the MLBAUDIO entitlement
WHEN that user taps on a postseason audio stream
THEN that user is able to listen to the stream successfully

title: MVPD Auth
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user with MLBALL but no MVPD entitlements
WHEN that user taps on a live postseason game
THEN that user is presented with the MVPD auth flow
AND the correct logo (postseason/year-specific) is displayed in the auth flow
AND user is able to view playback after successfully authenticating

GIVEN a single-team user with no MVPD entitlements
WHEN that user taps on a live postseason game
THEN that user is presented with the MVPD auth flow
AND the correct logo (postseason/year-specific) is displayed in the auth flow
AND user is able to view playback after successfully authenticating

title: Archived Games
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user with MLBALL but no MVPD entitlements
WHEN that user taps on an archived postseason game
THEN that user is able to successfully watch the game
